summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation to sign all documents necessary to complete the conveyance of a "Tunnel Easement" to the Central Puget Sound Regional Transit Authority allowing for the construction and operation of light rail transportation facilities beneath 12th Avenue South Viewpoint.
note: Clerk's Note: A similar Council Bill taking the same action was passed in 2004. See [Ordinance 121469](http://clerk.seattle.gov/~scripts/nph-brs.exe?s1=&s3=&s4=121469&s2=&s5=&Sect4=AND&l=20&Sect2=THESON&Sect3=PLURON&Sect5=CBORY&Sect6=HITOFF&d=ORDF&p=1&u=/~public/cbory.htm&r=1&f=G).
